original_text: Peter said to Ananias, ‘Ananias, Satan wanted you to tell a lie and you have obeyed him. You have told a lie to the Holy Spirit. That is a bad thing to do! You sold your field, but you did not give us all the money. You kept part of it for yourselves.
korean_text: 베드로가 이르되 아나니아야 어찌하여 사탄이 네 마음에 가득하여 네가 성령을 속이고 땅 값 얼마를 감추었느냐

sentences.original_text: Satan wanted you to tell a lie
You have told a lie to the Holy Spirit
That is a bad thing to do
but you did not give us all the money
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 우리에게 모든 돈을 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: You kept part of it for yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 일부를 너희를 위해 남겨두었다
